system.description: On a natural attack roll of 19-20, target is swallowed. Target takes [[/r 1d6]] damage per round and must pass a DC 14 CON check each round they remain swallowed to resist tongue-eater infection. Brood mother regurgitates all swallowed if dealt at least 15 damage in 1 round to the inside of its gullet or once a swallowed creature is infected.
